ticket.title: link_to options' documentation
ticket.original-body: Today I had a little hadeache trying to understand where to put the :method option in a link_to. It is not that I didn't know it, but a workmate pointed out that the documentation puts :method, :confirm, etc. under a heading named "Options", and the real argument name where you need to put them is html_options. Wouldn't it be easier to name the heading as the argument name? Just to make the documentation clear for everyone :)
